attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Data source obtained during service invoking.

attrs.name: init-blocks
attrs.desc: Number of blocks to be displayed initially.

attrs.name: wheel-blocks
attrs.desc: Number of scrolling blocks when the mouse wheel is scrolled up or down.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1

attrs.name: tag
attrs.desc: Setting the Dom Label of a Component
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is ul.

attrs.name: sub-tag
attrs.desc: Setting the Dom Label of a Component
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is li

events.name: before-click
events.desc: Event triggered before a user swipes the screen. event: Native event

events.name: click
events.desc: Sliding block click event; data: data of the clicked slider, index: index value of the clicked slider
